abstract: The future of social networking? Competing with Facebook? All those e-mails from people wanting you in their network? Ask your question for Dan Nye, the C.E.O. of LinkedIn, in the comments to this post.
snippet: The future of social networking? Competing with Facebook? All those e-mails from people wanting you in their network? Ask your question for Dan Nye, the C.E.O. of LinkedIn, in the comments to this post.
lead_paragraph: Dan Nye, the chief executive of LinkedIn, stopped for a visit recently to chat about the business networking site’s future and its approach to opening its system up to other developers. I wrote about some of his comments in this post.

headline.main: Ask Questions of Dan Nye, C.E.O. of LinkedIn
